parameter.name: routing
parameter.description: When indexing using the ability to control the routing, in order to get a document, the routing value should also be provided.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.description: The refresh parameter can be set to true in order to refresh the relevant shard before the get operation and make it searchable.

parameter.name: realtime
parameter.description: By default, the get API is realtime, and is not affected by the refresh rate of the index (when data will become visible for search).

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The get operation allows specifying a set of stored fields that will be returned by passing the fields parameter.

parameter.name: source
parameter.description: By default, the get operation returns the contents of the _source field unless you have used the fields parameter or if the _source field is disabled. You can turn off _source retrieval by using the _source parameter.

parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: List of document IDs to be retrieved.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Set it to _all or leave it empty in order to fetch the first document matching the id across all types.

parameter.name: sourceExclude
parameter.description: The _source_exclude parameter can be used to omit the unwanted parts from complete _source.

parameter.name: sourceInclude
parameter.description: The _source_include parameter can be used to filter out only one or two fields from the complete _source.
